interpretation:
The "person mountain biking" card represents the journey of pushing oneself to new heights and conquering challenges. This card signifies the need for adventure and the willingness to take risks. It is a reminder to embrace the journey and enjoy the ride, even when it's tough. This card can also indicate the need for physical exercise and outdoor activities to release stress and find balance. Associated keywords include adventure, challenge, risk-taking, perseverance, and physical activity.

When this card appears in a reading, it may suggest that the querent is embarking on a new adventure or facing a challenging situation. It can also indicate the need for the querent to be more active and take care of their physical health. Overall, the "person mountain biking" card encourages us to face our fears, push past our limits, and enjoy the journey towards our goals.
